import './post.css' import img1 from './images/1.jpeg' // import mops from './images/mops.jpeg' import likes from './images/like.png' import heart from './images/hearth.png' import {MoreVert} from '@mui/icons-material' import {Users} from "../../dummyData" import { useState } from 'react' export default function Post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) const [isLike, setIsLike] = useState(false) const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const likeHandler =() => { setLike(isLike ? like -1 : like+1) setIsLike (!isLike) } return (
u.id === post?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post?.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like}
{post.comment} комментариев
) }
